body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' contents_area ')]
date: //div[contains(@class, 'title_area')]//span[@class="date"]
title: //div[contains(@class, 'title_area')]//strong[@class="title"]

prune: no

test_url: https://www.naeu.playblackdesert.com/en-US/News/Detail?groupContentNo=451&countryType=en-US
